title: SET_RANDOM_TRAINS
content:
0x80D9F74197EA47D90xD461CA7F// SetRandomTrains
void SET_RANDOM_TRAINS(BOOL toggle);Parameters:toggle: Whether to enable random trains.Enables spawning random trains on the preset tracks.Requires SWITCH_TRAIN_TRACK and SET_TRAIN_TRACK_SPAWN_FREQUENCY to be set.Examples:LuaSwitchTrainTrack(0, true) -- Setting the Main train track(s) around LS and towards Sandy Shores active
SwitchTrainTrack(3, true) -- Setting the Metro tracks active
SetTrainTrackSpawnFrequency(0, 120000) -- The Train spawn frequency set for the game engine
SetTrainTrackSpawnFrequency(3, 120000) -- The Metro spawn frequency set for the game engine
SetRandomTrains(true) -- Telling the game we want to use randomly spawned trains
codeBlocks:
SwitchTrainTrack(0, true) -- Setting the Main train track(s) around LS and towards Sandy Shores active
SwitchTrainTrack(3, true) -- Setting the Metro tracks active
SetTrainTrackSpawnFrequency(0, 120000) -- The Train spawn frequency set for the game engine
SetTrainTrackSpawnFrequency(3, 120000) -- The Metro spawn frequency set for the game engine
SetRandomTrains(true) -- Telling the game we want to use randomly spawned trains
